Exited Twit-shit in 2023. Retired US Academic: Biochemist, cell and molecular biologist. Did cancer research for more than 30 years. Taught mechanisms of diseases (pathophysiology from genes to anatomy) for more than 10 years. Very worried about the current state of US and world politics. Loves reading, learning, listening to music, do cultural travels, photography, hiking, tasting bold wines and wood carving. Preferred cities Paris and New York. Lives between Switzerland, Burgundy and Taiwan.
